org.deeplearning4j.word2vec.vectorizer

Class BagOfWordsVectorizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.word2vec.vectorizer.BagOfWordsVectorizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Vectorizer

    public class BagOfWordsVectorizer
extends Object
implements Vectorizer
    Bag of words vectorizer. Transforms a document in to a bag of words
    Author:
    Adam Gibson

    • Constructor Detail

      • BagOfWordsVectorizer

        public BagOfWordsVectorizer(SentenceIterator iter,
                    TokenizerFactory tokenizer,
                    int label,
                    int numLabels,
                    Index index)
        Converts a document in to a bag of words
        Parameters:
        iter - the sentence iterator to use This handles segmenting the document in to whole segments
        tokenizer - the tokenizer to use
        label - the label of this document
        numLabels - the total number of labels for the problem
        index - a word vocab

      • BagOfWordsVectorizer

        public BagOfWordsVectorizer(SentenceIterator iter,
                    TokenizerFactory tokenizer,
                    int label,
                    int numLabels)
        Creates a bag of words vectorizer with no vocab. Note that this will count all words in the document.
        Parameters:
        iter - the iterator used to segment the document
        tokenizer - the tokenizer to use for word frequencies
        label - the label of this document
        numLabels - the number of labels for the domain
